readme.name: README.md
readme.content: Provides functionality to add/remove a class to/from an array of DOM-elements if browser address input field includes or doesn't include the same hash as in a component.

definitions.name: attributes

methods.name: checkHash
methods.description: Checks the hash and triggers the flexible toggle action.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the class names in the target elements.

parameters.name: addClass
parameters.description: A boolean value for a more flexible toggling action.
